basics.name: Babak Pourkazemi
basics.summary: Hi! My name is Babak Pourkazemi, and I’m a UVA student graduating in 2015. I’m very interested in developing for new platforms (e.g., mobile), working in the application layer, and using statically-typed languages. More broadly, the use of software to connect people to information in new ways is fascinating to me. Feel free to reach out anytime.

work.summary: Owned the development of a tool used to onboard Tumblr blogs onto the Yahoo! content platform.
highlights: Used to onboard 160+ Tumblr advertisers, resulting in millions of impressions across the Tumblr network.
Built with node.js and the mojito framework, among various internal Yahoo! technologies.

work.summary: Responsible for the development of a jQuery plugin for the AddThis social tools, as well as a bookmarklet to preview the AddThis tools across the web.
highlights: Led the three-person intern team in the company hackathon.
Developed familiarity with popular web tools jQuery, Grunt, and node.js.

awards.title: Center for Open Science Award
awards.summary: Hack UVA sponsor award for my project, Comb.
